publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3694<> Linda Fabiani: Scotland for Sanitation—That the Parliament congratulates Homeless International and the Scottish Homeless International Action Group on the launch of the Scotland for Sanitation Appeal on 6 December 2005, which has been formed to support community-led sanitation initiatives in Asia and Africa, and welcomes the fundraising and consciousness-raising participation of housing providers and agencies for this appeal. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3694<> Linda Fabiani: Scotland for Sanitation—That the Parliament congratulates Homeless International and the Scottish Homeless International Action Group on the launch of the Scotland for Sanitation Appeal on 6 December 2005, which has been formed to support community-led sanitation initiatives in Asia and Africa, and welcomes the fundraising and consciousness-raising participation of housing providers and agencies for this appeal. Supported by: Donald Gorrie

S2M-3694<> Scotland for Sanitation (lodged on 7 December 2005) Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Tricia Marwick*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*

*S2M-3694# Linda Fabiani: Scotland for Sanitation—That the Parliament congratulates Homeless International and the Scottish Homeless International Action Group on the launch of the Scotland for Sanitation Appeal on 6 December 2005, which has been formed to support community-led sanitation initiatives in Asia and Africa, and welcomes the fundraising and consciousness-raising participation of housing providers and agencies for this appeal. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Ms Rosemary Byrne* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3694# Scotland for Sanitation (lodged on 7 December 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-3694# Scotland for Sanitation (lodged on 7 December 2005) Elaine Smith*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-3694# Scotland for Sanitation (lodged on 7 December 2005) Shiona Baird*, Mr John Swinney*
S2M-3694# Scotland for Sanitation (lodged on 7 December 2005) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-3694# Scotland for Sanitation (lodged on 7 December 2005) Mr Jamie Stone*
